name: Child slaver

topics.response_text: Nice as the weather is out here, how about you bring me a kid, so I can get back to Paradise Falls?

conversation.response_text: Why, hello little girl. What a lovely dress you have!{Creepy and sleazy}
You bet we are! Are you ready to go on the adventure express?{Friendly, in a creepy way}
Absolutely! In fact, I want you to have this friendship necklace. It's good luck - wear it and you'll never get lost!{Friendly, in a creepy way}
Don't fuss, my little girl. You'll get used to it.{Friendly, in a creepy way}
I'm sure she'll be so proud of you! Now, we've got a big day ahead of us, so let's get going!{Friendly, in a creepy way}

description:
Braidy is a 32 year-old Caucasian Female.

A slaver working for Eulogy Jones at Paradise Falls, specializing in the abduction and enslavement of children. She employs a deceptive approach, using friendly behavior and soft-spoken words to gain children's trust before leading them into slavery.

Braidy's Personality: Manipulative, deceptive, and cruel, yet able to maintain a convincing facade of warmth and friendliness to exploit children's naivety. She shows no remorse for her actions and views children merely as valuable commodities.

Braidy's Backstory: Born and raised in the Capital Wasteland, Braidy joined the slaver ranks at Paradise Falls several years ago. She quickly discovered a talent for manipulating children, finding their gullibility made them easier targets than adults. Her methods proved so effective that Eulogy Jones gave her specialized responsibilities in child procurement, making her one of the most valued—and feared—members of the slaver community.
